body:
Employee number three, created a Vue app from the ground up to allow neuroscience researchers to manage and publish their data. Features include: File upload system, file management, model relationship management, collaboration tools, advanced search with filters, autocomplete and suggestions. 

 Created and reinforced engineering processes, standards and systems. 

 Created a component library alongside designers that is used across multiple applications. 

 Lead sprints, grooming meetings and daily standups. Worked with product managers to set priorities and sprints. 

 Set up processes for my team to work asynchronously at the start of working remote during COVID-19.
